name: Project Zeit
description:
You are a slime who has been captured by scientists. NOO!!

The scientists took you in because they found out that you had a special ability. You can rewind in time about 3 secounds, but thats not all, when you rewind you split and create an instance of yourself that do the moves
you just did at those three secounds, over and over again...

The scientists have created a bunch of tests that you have to complete in order to be set free. These tests will challenge your mind and gamer instincts!!
